revised_title: A Register of Winds and Weather at Chusan Island: Observations of the Mercurial Barometer
tldr: This article presents a detailed register of winds and weather, along with observations of the mercurial barometer, at Chusan Island, a location in 30 degrees North latitude on the coast of China. The author, James Cuningham, provides a daily record of weather conditions, wind patterns, and barometric readings from November 1700 to January 1701.
